story.mission: Your mission is to defend Earth from the next impact!

introGame.title: What was the DART Mission?
introGame.summaryP1: <1>DART</1> tested <3>planetary defense</3> with kinetic impact: hitting an asteroid to nudge its orbit.
introGame.summaryP2: It worked: a tiny push changed the orbit. With time, that avoids an Earth impact. ğŸŒğŸš€
introGame.summaryP3: The earlier you act, the easier it is to deflect.
introGame.skip: Don't show this intro next time

anticipate.t: shoot when the asteroid is high; you'll have more tries.

position.t: get under its path and move just enough.

cadence.t: there's a small cooldown; don't mash space.

priority.t: if one is headed straight to Earth, take it first.

relax.t: missed shots happenâ€”restart and try again ğŸ˜‰
